Room.Name: Appleton Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are casually walking along Appleton Road, northwest of Golden Dolphin.
Room.LongDescription: You can see the intersection with Golden Dolphin Way to the southeast, and the City Walls which surround the city just to the south of the street. A large number of small houses are located on the west side of the street where the various farmers and their families live. These houses provide the quickest access to the various fields in this area of town.
